An-upgrade-in-e-er---a--e-

                                                                                    <img src="../media/182502592759.png"/>
                                                                                      <div class="caption"><p>

The old beast is being replaced by the new hotness.


</p><p>An upgrade in every way except for the lack of a graphics card.</p><p>I’m hoping to use an external gpu via the wifi card slot.  Which is already a precarious decision, but makes me even more insecure because the ngff adapter I need seems harder to come by.  It’s also a newer format, so maybe it has better odds of success?</p><p>The processor seems to have a stable run at 3.1GHz, rarely spiking up to 3.3, but no going back now.  Anyway, these days the games I play are pretty simple graphically.</p>

</div>
